amendment.description: To prohibit the use of Federal funds for implementing or enforcing COVID-19 vaccine mandates.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3831, under the order of 9/29/21, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 50. Record Vote Number: 395.

action.text: Amendment SA 3831 proposed by Senator Leahy for Senator Marshall to Amendment SA 3830. (consideration: CR S6805, S6808-6809; text: CR S6805) To prohibit the use of Federal funds for implementing or enforcing COVID-19 vaccine mandates.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3831 proposed by Senator Leahy for Senator Marshall to Amendment SA 3830.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 3831, under the order of 9/29/21, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 50. Record Vote Number: 395.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 3831, under the order of 9/29/21, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 50. Record Vote Number: 395.
